meta.content: Jeopardy Archive David Gard Monica Thieu Jason Keller Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6545.

td.p: David Gard, a retail horticulturalist from Jamaica Plain, Massachusetts
Monica Thieu, a psychology student from Dallas, Texas
Jason Keller, a tutor from Highland Park, New Jersey

tr.td: PORTU-GALS & GUYS
GENETICS
3 Ls
TONY-WINNING MUSICALS IN OTHER WORDS
AN IMPORTANT QUESTION
WHO WANTS A SANDWICH?

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Prince Henry the Navigator

Monica!
')

[Monica "mock pouts"]

corn

Monica!

Monica!

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Jason
Monica!
David
NAME THE COMPOSER
(Alex: And each of the clues will be delivered by maverick classical violinist Gilles Apap.)
WHO'S YOUR MAMA?
AMERICAN HISTORY
LAKES
NATURAL SYMBOLS
LET'S MAKE THEM SCOTTISH
(Alex: And each correct response will begin with the letters M-A-C, as in [Scottish accent] "Mac".)
